name: Glazed Lemon Supreme Pound Cake
author: pamc
summary: The use of lemon cake mix, lemon gelatin, lemon extract and fresh lemon juice make this cake a lemon-lover's dream.  It's also amazingly easy.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package lemon flavored Jell-O® mix
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 10 inch tube pan
In a large bowl, combine cake mix, gelatin, lemon extract, apricot nectar, eggs and oil
Mix to combine, then beat on high speed for 3 minutes
Pour batter into a 10 inch tube pan
Bake in the preheated oven for 60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the cake comes out clean
While cake is baking, make the glaze:  In a small bowl, combine lemon juice and confectioners sugar; stir until smooth
Remove cake from oven, and with cake still in pan, pour glaze over top of hot cake, tipping pan to allow excess glaze to run down sides of pan
Allow cake to cool in pan 10 minutes
Remove from pan and cool completely on wire rack
